channel.title: CVE Feed for Booking Algorithms -- BA Book Everything
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Booking Algorithms -- BA Book Everything

item.title: CVE-2024-32598|2024-08-02T02:13:40.107Z -- booking%20algorithms -- ba%20book%20everything
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Booking Algorithms BA Book Everything allows Stored XSS.This issue affects BA Book Everything: from n/a through 1.6.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-32125|2024-08-02T02:06:43.991Z -- booking%20algorithms -- ba%20book%20everything
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Booking Algorithms BA Book Everything.This issue affects BA Book Everything: from n/a through 1.6.4.
